title: jmri-json-turnout-client-message
description: Schema data object in message from client to JMRI for type "turnout"

userName.description: If present, set the user name of the turnout

comment.description: If present, set the comment for the turnout

inverted.description: true if turnout is inverted; false otherwise

state.description: If present, sets the state of the turnout

feedbackMode.description: If present, sets the feedback mode for the turnout

sensor.description: The feedback sensor names for the turnout in order

items.description: The name of the sensor to set or null to unset a sensor
